meanings.definition: A person who is insured along with another or others.
meanings.sent1: The coinsured was happy to share the insurance policy with their family.
meanings.sent2: The coinsured and their spouse both benefited from the joint insurance coverage.
meanings.sent3: The coinsured and their siblings made sure to split the insurance costs equally.
meanings.sent4: Being coinsured felt like having a safety net in uncertain times.
meanings.sent5: The coinsured person felt secure knowing they were covered by the insurance policy.

meanings.definition: To insure jointly with another or others.
meanings.sent1: They coinsured their car with their best friend to save money on insurance.
meanings.sent2: The couple decided to coinsure their new home to protect their investment.
meanings.sent3: It was a smart move to coinsure the valuable items in case of any accidents.
meanings.sent4: Coinsuring their belongings felt like a responsible decision for the future.
meanings.sent5: The decision to coinsure their health brought peace of mind to the family.
